about_the_game:
In GONNER2, our altruistic and unexpected hero Ikk is back! And this time Death needs his help. Her lair has been taken over by a mysterious presence and she needs Ikk to take it down. Journey your way through deep dark chaotic places with sparks of unimaginable colour and crazy bosses, all while trying to literally keep your head!! GONNER2 is a procedurally generated platformer with roguelike elements that will keep you on your toes - now with more added, colour and chaos!

GONNER2 is a sequel to the IGF winning game GoNNER.


  • Intense platformer shooter action
  • Procedurally generated levels in a strange and surreal world
  • Nonlinear level structure
  • A bunch of heads, guns and upgrades that you can combine
  • Secrets & mysteries!


P.S. Along with the single player journey to help Death, there is a party co-op mode so you and your friends can lose your heads together!

In GONNER2, our altruistic and unexpected hero Ikk is back! And this time Death needs his help. Her lair has been taken over by a mysterious presence and she needs Ikk to take it down. Journey your way through deep dark chaotic places with sparks of unimaginable colour and crazy bosses, all while trying to literally keep your head!! GONNER2 is a procedurally generated platformer with roguelike elements that will keep you on your toes - now with more added, colour and chaos!

GONNER2 is a sequel to the IGF winning game GoNNER.


  • Intense platformer shooter action
  • Procedurally generated levels in a strange and surreal world
  • Nonlinear level structure
  • A bunch of heads, guns and upgrades that you can combine
  • Secrets & mysteries!


P.S. Along with the single player journey to help Death, there is a party co-op mode so you and your friends can lose your heads together!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or similar (tested on ubuntu based system)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G4560 @ 3.50GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family / AMD Radeon RX Vega 7
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu or similar (tested on ubuntu based system)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 CPU @ 3.20GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple M1 chipsets are not supported
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple M1 chipsets are not supported

name: GONNER2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G4560 @ 3.50GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family / AMD Radeon RX Vega 7
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 CPU @ 3.20GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this sequel to GoNNER: Journey your way through deep dark chaotic places with unimaginable sparks of colour as you go on a mission to help Death rid a mysterious presence from her lair. Battle crazy bosses, lose your head (a lot), in this messy, cute, fast-paced procedurally-generated platformer.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Swedish
